ISSUE.TITLE: Feature : Make row data available in API Webhook
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It's available for Slack/Twilio apps but we aren't parsing API client params. Requested by : discord user feliche.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): Datatype scale value correction Removed scale/length value based on datatype fix #302 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: data in http client webhook, condition correction * Made data available in http client fields(params, body, headers) * Fixed condition issue closes #296, closes #237 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
